title: UI overlay gets cut off quickly

content.raw:
The UI overlay seems to expect a certain minimum window size and gets cut off if the width is smaller than that, making it impossible to see important information like the score of the right team:

![](http://i.imgur.com/gYNj47g.png)

It would be nice if there was a bit of dynamic resizing, there's definitely some space left-over around the playmode dropdown box. I can also think of some ways to reduce the space needed:

- remove the text that displays the current playmode - not necessary if the dropdown always shows the current one (see #22)
- `# of Players: 0` seems more verbose than it has to be - could be `0 players`
- `Sim Time` seems redundant, it's already displayed in Gazebo UI below. If this is removed, `Game Time` could potentially also be changed to just `Time`
